items.question: when does this story take place?Fall and Winter of the 1959-1960 The Dead Poets Meet in a Cave, Where John Keating and The Original Dead Poets Met. They spend Time taking Turns Quoting Poetry. After Neil Perry Commits Suicide, It's Snowing So Winter and The Film Opens on a New School Term So Fall, and Miss October 1959 is in a Playboy Magazine in one of the cave Scenes.
items.answer: Very probably the fall of 1959. One of the times that the (new) Dead Poets Society meets in the cave, a poem is read that had been written on the back of a Playboy centerfold (removed from the magazine itself). The playmate is Elaine Reynolds, Miss October 1959.
